blog.title: IonicX AI
blog.desc: Insights, guides, and case studies on AI for Singapore SMEs.
blog.0.title: Why SG SMEs Need AI-Powered Websites in 2026
blog.0.excerpt: The AI revolution isn't coming ‚Äî it's here. Discover why Singapore SMEs that adopt AI now will dominate their industries.
blog.1.title: EIS 400% Tax Deduction: How to Save 68% on Your Business Website
blog.1.excerpt: A step-by-step guide to claiming the Enterprise Innovation Scheme and dramatically reducing your AI investment cost.
blog.2.title: 10 Industries We've Built AI Websites For (Case Studies)
blog.2.excerpt: From home bakers to real estate agencies ‚Äî see how AI transforms businesses across 10 different verticals.
blog.0.h.1: The AI Shift is Happening Now
blog.0.h.2: What AI-Powered Means for Your Website
blog.0.p.0: In 2026, artificial intelligence isn't just a buzzword ‚Äî it's the backbone of competitive business. Singapore's Budget 2026 has made it clear: the government wants SMEs to adopt AI, and they're putting serious money behind it with the 400% EIS tax deduction.
blog.0.p.1: Over 73% of Singapore consumers now expect instant responses when they visit a business website. Traditional static websites simply can't deliver. AI-powered websites with chatbots, smart search, and personalized recommendations are becoming the new standard.
blog.0.p.2: An AI-powered website isn't just a website with a chatbot slapped on. It means intelligent customer interaction, automated lead capture, smart content delivery, and data-driven optimization happening 24/7 without human intervention.
blog.0.p.3: Every month you delay, your competitors who've already adopted AI are capturing customers you're missing. The gap between AI-enabled and traditional businesses is widening exponentially.
blog.0.p.4: Start with a free consultation. We'll assess your business, recommend the right AI solution, and show you exactly how much you'll save with the EIS tax deduction. Most businesses go from consultation to live website in 2-3 weeks.
blog.1.p.0: The Enterprise Innovation Scheme (EIS) is Singapore's most generous tax incentive for businesses investing in innovation and technology. Under Budget 2026, qualifying AI investments receive a 400% tax deduction ‚Äî meaning for every S$1 you spend, you get S$4 in tax deductions.
blog.1.p.1: Under Budget 2026, the Enterprise Innovation Scheme provides a 400% tax deduction on qualifying technology investments. This means every dollar you invest in AI gets multiplied by four for tax deduction purposes.
blog.1.p.2: Take our Starter plan at S$2,888: 400% deduction = S$11,552 deductible amount. At 17% corporate tax rate, that's S$1,964 in tax savings. Your effective cost? Just S$924. That's a 68% discount on professional AI website development.
blog.1.p.3: Any Singapore-registered business (UEN holder) investing in qualifying technology solutions. AI-powered websites, chatbots, and automation tools all qualify. Both new and existing businesses are eligible.
blog.1.p.4: We handle the documentation for you. After your AI solution is deployed, we provide all the necessary paperwork for your tax filing. Simply pass it to your accountant during tax season. It's that simple.
blog.2.p.0: We've built AI-powered websites for over 10 industries in Singapore. Each solution is tailored to the specific needs, workflows, and customer expectations of that vertical. Here's a look at how AI transforms different industries.
blog.2.p.1: From kopitiam QR ordering to home bakery online shops, F&B businesses see immediate ROI from AI chatbots that handle orders 24/7. Sweet Bliss Bakery saw a 40% increase in online orders within the first month.
blog.2.p.2: TCM clinics, beauty salons, gyms, and fitness studios all benefit from AI-powered booking systems, symptom checkers, and member management. Harmony TCM reduced no-shows by 60% with AI appointment reminders.
blog.2.p.3: Interior design firms, real estate agencies, and service businesses use AI to match clients with the right solutions, automate follow-ups, and provide instant quotes. Elite Properties SG processes 3x more inquiries with the same team.
blog.2.p.4: Wedding planners, tattoo artists, and event companies showcase their work with AI-enhanced portfolios that intelligently recommend services based on client preferences and budget.
blog.cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business with AI?
blog.cta.desc: Book a free consultation and see what AI can do for your industry.
about.page.title: About
about.page.desc: We're on a mission to make AI accessible and affordable for every Singapore SME.
about.founder.name: Isaac Yap
about.founder.story: After years in the tech industry, Isaac saw a gap: powerful AI tools existed, but they were out of reach for small businesses. IonicX AI was born to bridge that gap ‚Äî bringing enterprise-grade AI to SMEs at SME-friendly prices. With Singapore's national AI strategy as a tailwind, IonicX builds Personal AI Agents that handle everything from customer service to operations management.

about.story.title: Our Story
about.story.p1: IonicX AI was founded with a simple belief: every Singapore SME deserves access to powerful AI tools that were previously only available to large corporations. We build AI-powered websites and chatbots specifically designed for small businesses.
about.story.p2: From home bakers to massage therapists, tattoo artists to real estate agents ‚Äî we help businesses across every industry automate their operations, engage customers 24/7, and grow revenue with AI.
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.statement: To make AI accessible and affordable for every Singapore SME. We believe that small businesses shouldn't need a big budget to benefit from artificial intelligence ‚Äî and with the EIS 400% tax deduction, the barrier has never been lower.

pricing.eis.title: EIS 400% Tax
pricing.eis.desc: Singapore businesses can claim a 400% tax deduction on qualifying innovation expenses under the Enterprise Innovation Scheme (EIS). This means your AI investment costs significantly less than the sticker price.
pricing.eis.deduction: Tax deduction on qualifying AI investments
pricing.eis.step1: 1. You invest S$5,888 in an AI solution (e.g. Growth plan)
pricing.eis.step2: 2. You claim 400% tax deduction: S$5,888 √ó 4 = S$23,552 in deductions
pricing.eis.step3: 3. At 17% corporate tax rate, you save S$4,004 in taxes ‚Äî making your effective cost just S$1,884
pricing.eis.disclaimer: Please consult your accountant for specific eligibility. EIS benefits depend on your company's tax situation and qualifying criteria set by IRAS.
pricing.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
pricing.faq.timeline.q: How long does it take to build my AI website?
pricing.faq.timeline.a: Most projects are completed in 2-3 weeks from kickoff. Enterprise projects with custom integrations may take 4-6 weeks. We'll give you a specific timeline during your free consultation.
pricing.faq.eisHow.q: How do I claim the EIS 400% tax deduction?
pricing.faq.eisHow.a: After your AI solution is deployed, we provide all the necessary documentation. Simply pass it to your accountant during tax filing season. Any Singapore-registered business (UEN holder) investing in qualifying technology solutions is eligible.
pricing.faq.maintenance.q: What does the yearly maintenance cover?
pricing.faq.maintenance.a: Maintenance includes hosting, SSL certificates, AI chatbot uptime, performance monitoring, security updates, and basic content updates. Think of it as keeping your AI employee running 24/7.
pricing.faq.changes.q: Can I make changes after the website is built?
pricing.faq.changes.a: Yes! Basic content updates are included in your maintenance plan. For larger changes or new features, we offer add-on packages or can scope a custom project.
pricing.faq.hosting.a: Yes, hosting and SSL certificates are included in your yearly maintenance fee. We use enterprise-grade cloud hosting for fast load times and 99.9% uptime.
pricing.faq.refund.a: We offer a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with the initial design mockup, we'll revise it until you are. Once development begins, we work closely with you at every stage to ensure the final product meets your expectations.

solutions.useCase.4: A freelancer auto-generates social media posts, sends invoice reminders, and follows up on leads ‚Äî all on autopilot, saving 15+ hours every week.
